property.name: content
property.label: Content
property.description: Content of the quote - in Markdown format.
property.default: The terms *inspection*, *custody*, *storage*, *repair* or *other treatment* shall include, where applicable, the transport or towing of any goods to the premises used or appropriated by the bailee for acceptance for any such inspection, custody, storage, repair or other treatment as the case may be.

property.name: reference
property.label: Reference
property.description: Link used for the reference in Markdown format - leave url blank if no link is available.

property.name: className
property.label: Class name
property.description: Additional CSS class to be applied.
